headline: LEYBOLD CRYOGENIC VACUUM PUMP
keywords: cryogenci vacuum pumps  cryo pumps  cryos  helium pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Cryopumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model 1500SL
Inlet Flange Conflat 200.0 mm (7.874 in)
Foreline Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 1,600.0 l/s (3,390.5 CFM)
Pumping Speed Water Vapor 4,600.00 l/s (9,747.83 CFM)
Pumping Speed Argon 1,300.00 l/s (2,754.82 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 3.75E-10(En) torr (5.00E-10 mbar)
Pumping Capacity--Hydrogen 2,500.00 l/s (5,297.73 CFM)
Accessories

Require compressor for operation (not included)

Other Information

APPLIED P/N 0190-03794

  • Regeneration valve DN 40 KF
  • Capacity for Ar: 1800bar x L
  • Capacity for H2 at 10E-6 mbar: 16 bar x L
  • Capacity for H2O: 190 bar x L
  • Max. pumping speed for Ar/N2: 14 mbar x L/s (840 sccm)
  • Max. pumping speed for H2: 6 mbar x L/s (360 sccm)
  • Crossover value: 210 mbar x L (160 Torr x L)
  • Recovery time from 10 mTorr to < 5 x 10E-7 Torr: Regeneration times:
  • Fast regeneration (cold to cold, 2nd stage at 20 K) < 50 min
  • Total regeneration (cold to cold, 2nd stage at 20 K) < 170 min
  • Warm-up from operating temperature to 300 K < 30 min
  • Cool-down from 300 K up to operating temperature < 80 min
  • Fast regeneration cycles between total regeneration > 50
  • Noise, measured at 1 m (3 ft.) radius from the pump dB(A) < 70
  • Heaters 1st stage 160W / 35VAC
  • Heaters 2ndstage 90W / 35VAC
  • Temperature measurement 1st stage Pt 100
  • Temperature measurement 2nd stage Si diode
  • Built-in coldhead
CE Marked YES
Year of Manufacture 2001
Exterior Dimensions
Width 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
Depth 24.000 in (61.0 cm)
Height 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Weight 66 lb (30 kg)
